title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Developing Fundamental Principles of Mathematical Change Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary calculus and function concept comprehension
context.additional_context: Acquiring mathematical change concepts applicable to workplace tasks in a self-directed digital learning environment for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply concepts of rates of change, cumulative change, and differentiation/integration to real-world business data for explanatory purposes.
Learners can create analytical reports on change patterns using mathematical modeling tools.
Learners can propose improvements for educational materials by applying Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
